name: From the Beyond
description:
Known Issues

There is a lag spike when the game first starts.

Controls

Move - WASD or Arrow Keys

Attack - Left click

Ability - Right Click

Mechanics

Defeat all the bosses in a level to win. When you die you become a wraith and can possess enemies so long as their willpower is less than yours. Gain additional willpower by killing more enemies. If you remain as a wraith too long you will lose.

Different enemies have different attacks and abilities. Use their own might against them!
